If Fitli is notified of any fraud in regards to transactions at your business or a customer who completed a purchase from your business files a chargeback on their credit card, Fitli will pass those charges on to your account in the next billing cycle (inclusive of any fees levied by the payment processor).We encourage both parties to resolve any disagreements amicably.
